import React,{useState} from 'react' import './PostDetails.css' export default function postDetails(item,showDetails) { return (
{item.item.postedBy.name}
{ item.item.comments.map((eachComment) => { return (

{eachComment.postedBy.name} {eachComment.comment}

) }) }

{item.item.likes.length} likes

{item.item.body}

mood {setComment(e.target.value)}} />
{showDetails}} > close
) }
